name: Due Diligence Expired For NGO
response_html:
Action Required: Complete Your NGO Due Diligence Information

{{doc.ngo_name}} - {{doc.ngo}}

Dear {{doc.ngo_name}} Team,

Your organization needs to complete its due diligence information in the {{donor.donor_name}} mGrant portal. This information is required for your NGO to be eligible for current and future grant opportunities.

Required Actions for NGO Due Diligence:

  1. Log in to your {{donor.donor_name}} mGrant portal account
  2. Navigate to "My Organisation" module
  3. Click on the "Due Diligence" tab
  4. Click "Add Row" to access the full due diligence form
  5. Complete all required fields and upload necessary documents:
    • PAN Number
    • Registration documents
    • 80G Certificate
    • 12A Certificate
    • FCRA details (if applicable)
    • Last 3 years' Balance Sheets
    • Last 3 years' Annual Reports

Important: Your NGO must complete the due diligence process to be considered for grant opportunities. Incomplete information may affect your eligibility.

Complete NGO Due Diligence

If you need assistance while completing the due diligence form, our support team is here to help.

Best regards,
The {{donor.donor_name}} mGrant Team

© {{ frappe.utils.getdate().year }} {{donor.donor_name}}. All rights reserved.

For support, contact: {{donor.email}}
